trans-unit.source: Note: Because there is no universally agreed-upon specification for param strings, it is not possible to encode complex data structures using this method in a manner that works ideally across all languages supporting such input. trans-unit.source: Note: Do not use this method to remove native properties such as checked, disabled, or selected. This will remove the property completely and, once removed, cannot be added again to element. Use .prop() to set these properties to false instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请勿使用此方法删除本机属性，例如选中，禁用或选定。这将完全删除该属性，并且一旦删除，就不能再次将其添加到element中。使用 .prop() 将这些属性设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Note: For both plain objects and DOM objects other than window, if a triggered event name matches the name of a property on the object, jQuery will attempt to invoke the property as a method if no event handler calls event.preventDefault(). If this behavior is not desired, use .triggerHandler() instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于普通对象和非 window 对象的DOM对象，如果触发的事件名称与对象上属性的名称匹配，则如果没有事件处理程序调用 event.preventDefault() ，则jQuery将尝试将该属性作为方法来调用。如果不需要此行为，请改用 .triggerHandler() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: For performance reasons, the dynamic state of certain form elements (e.g., user data typed into textarea and user selections made to a select) is not copied to the cloned elements. When cloning input elements, the dynamic state of the element (e.g., user data typed into text inputs and user selections made to a checkbox) is retained in the cloned elements.
trans-unit.target: 注意：出于性能原因，某些表单元素的动态状态（例如，将用户数据键入 textarea 以及对 select 做出的用户选择）不会复制到克隆的元素中。在克隆 input 元素时，该元素的动态状态（例如，输入到文本输入中的用户数据以及对复选框所做的用户选择）保留在克隆的元素中。

trans-unit.source: Note: Host objects (or objects used by browser host environments to complete the execution environment of ECMAScript) have a number of inconsistencies which are difficult to robustly feature detect cross-platform. As a result of this, $.isPlainObject() may evaluate inconsistently across browsers in certain instances.
trans-unit.target: 注意：主机对象（或浏览器主机环境用来完成ECMAScript执行环境的对象）具有许多不一致之处，很难以健壮的方式检测跨平台。结果，在某些情况下， $.isPlainObject() 可能在浏览器中的计算结果不一致。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you use a custom jQuery build without the effects module, the :animated selector will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果使用不带效果模块的自定义jQuery构建，则 :animated 选择器将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Note: In Internet Explorer up to and including version 9, setting the text content of an HTML element may corrupt the text nodes of its children that are being removed from the document as a result of the operation. If you are keeping references to these DOM elements and need them to be unchanged, use .empty().html( string ) instead of .html(string) so that the elements are removed from the document before the new string is assigned to the element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在9版及更高版本的Internet Explorer中，设置HTML元素的文本内容可能会损坏由于操作而从文档中删除的子元素的文本节点。如果您保留对这些DOM元素的引用，并且希望它们保持不变，请使用 .empty().html( string ) 而不是 .html(string) ,以便在将新字符串分配给DOM 之前从文档中删除这些元素。元件。

trans-unit.source: Note: In order for .die() to function correctly, the selector used with it must match exactly the selector initially used with .live().

trans-unit.source: Note: The .live() and .delegate() methods cannot be used to detect the load event of an iframe. The load event does not correctly bubble up the parent document and the event.target isn't set by Firefox, IE9 or Chrome, which is required to do event delegation.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该 .live() 和 .delegate() 方法不能用于检测 load 的iframe事件。加载事件无法正确地使父文档冒泡，并且Firefox，IE9或Chrome未设置event.target，而事件委托是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Note: The deferred.always() method receives the arguments that were used to .resolve() or .reject() the Deferred object, which are often very different. For this reason, it's best to use it only for actions that do not require inspecting the arguments. In all other cases, use explicit .done() or .fail() handlers since the arguments will have well-known orders.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所述的 deferred.always() 方法接收了用来参数 .resolve() 或 .reject() 的 Deferred 对象，这往往是非常不同的。因此，最好仅将其用于不需要检查参数的操作。在所有其他情况下，请使用显式 .done() 或 .fail() 处理程序，因为参数将具有众所周知的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Note: The first argument must be a DOM element, not a jQuery object or plain JavaScript object.
trans-unit.target: 注意：第一个参数必须是DOM元素，而不是jQuery对象或普通JavaScript对象。

trans-unit.source: Note: The settings specified here will affect all calls to $.ajax or Ajax-based derivatives such as $.get(). This can cause undesirable behavior since other callers (for example, plugins) may be expecting the normal default settings. For that reason we strongly recommend against using this API. Instead, set the options explicitly in the call or define a simple plugin to do so.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此处指定的设置将影响对 $.ajax 或基于Ajax的派生类（如 $.get() 所有调用。这可能会导致不良行为，因为其他调用者（例如插件）可能期望使用正常的默认设置。因此，强烈建议您不要使用此API。而是在调用中显式设置选项或定义一个简单的插件即可。

trans-unit.target: 注意：此方法可能会导致性能问题，尤其是在许多元素上使用时。如果遇到此类问题，请使用性能测试工具来确定此方法是否引起了这些问题。此外，如果显示值在不同的视口尺寸上不同，则此方法可能会导致响应式布局出现问题。

trans-unit.source: Note: To reverse the .add() you can use .not( elements | selector ) to remove elements from the jQuery results, or .end() to return to the selection before you added.
trans-unit.target: 注意：要反转 .add() ，可以使用.not（ .not( elements | selector ) 从jQuery结果中删除元素，或使用 .end() 返回添加之前的选择。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike shorthand animation methods such as .slideDown() and .fadeIn(), the .animate() method does not make hidden elements visible as part of the effect. For example, given $( "someElement" ).hide().animate({height: "20px"}, 500), the animation will run, but the element will remain hidden.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不同于速记动画的方法，如 .slideDown() 和 .fadeIn() 中， .animate() 方法并没有使隐藏的元素的效果的一部分是可见的。例如，给定 $( "someElement" ).hide().animate({height: "20px"}, 500) ，动画将运行，但元素将保持隐藏状态。

trans-unit.source: Note: Using .clone() has the side-effect of producing elements with duplicate id attributes, which are supposed to be unique. Where possible, it is recommended to avoid cloning elements with this attribute or using class attributes as identifiers instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 .clone() 具有产生具有重复 id 属性的元素的副作用，这些id属性应该是唯一的。建议尽可能避免克隆具有此属性的元素，或者避免使用 class 属性作为标识符。

trans-unit.source: Note: Using a proxied function to unbind an event on an element will unbind all proxied functions on that element, as the same proxy function is used for all proxied events. To allow unbinding a specific event, use unique class names on the event (e.g. click.proxy1, click.proxy2) when attaching them.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用代理功能取消绑定元素上的事件将取消绑定该元素上的所有代理功能，因为所有代理事件都使用相同的代理功能。要允许取消绑定特定事件，请在附加事件时在事件上使用唯一的类名（例如， click.proxy1 和 click.proxy2 ）。

trans-unit.source: Note: When a CSS selector string is passed to .filter(), text and comment nodes will always be removed from the resulting jQuery object during the filtering process. When a specific node or array of nodes are provided, a text or comment node will be included in the resulting jQuery object only if it matches one of the nodes in the filtering array.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当CSS选择器字符串传递给 .filter() 时，在过滤过程中，文本和注释节点将始终从生成的jQuery对象中删除。当提供特定节点或节点数组时，仅当文本或注释节点与过滤数组中的节点之一匹配时，文本或注释节点才会包括在结果jQuery对象中。

trans-unit.source: Note: When a CSS selector string is passed to .not(), text and comment nodes will always be removed from the resulting jQuery object during the filtering process. When a specific node or array of nodes are provided, text or comment nodes will only be removed from the jQuery object if they match one of the nodes in the filtering array.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当CSS选择器字符串传递给 .not() 时，在过滤过程中，文本和注释节点将始终从生成的jQuery对象中删除。当提供特定的节点或节点数组时，仅当文本或注释节点与过滤数组中的一个节点匹配时，才会从jQuery对象中删除它们。

trans-unit.source: Note: if attempting to animate an element with a height or width of 0px, where contents of the element are visible due to overflow, jQuery may clip this overflow during animation. By fixing the dimensions of the original element being hidden however, it is possible to ensure that the animation runs smoothly. A clearfix can be used to automatically fix the dimensions of your main element without the need to set this manually.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果尝试对高度或宽度为0px的元素进行动画处理（由于溢出而该元素的内容可见），则jQuery可能会在动画过程中剪辑此溢出。但是，通过固定隐藏的原始元素的尺寸，可以确保动画流畅运行。一个clearfix可以用来自动修复你的主要元件的尺寸，而无需手动设置此。

trans-unit.source: Note: jQuery does not support getting the offset coordinates of hidden elements or accounting for margins set on the <html> document element.

trans-unit.source: The .delay() method is best for delaying between queued jQuery effects. Because it is limited—it doesn't, for example, offer a way to cancel the delay—.delay() is not a replacement for JavaScript's native setTimeout function, which may be more appropriate for certain use cases.

trans-unit.source: jQuery 3 changes the behavior of this method to align it to the Dataset API specifications. Specifically, jQuery 3 transforms every two-character sequence of "-" (U+002D) followed by a lowercase ASCII letter by the uppercase version of the letter as per definition of the algorithm of the Dataset API. Writing a statement like $( "body" ).data( { "my-name": "aValue" } ).data(); will return { myName: "aValue" }.
trans-unit.target: jQuery 3更改了此方法的行为，以使其与Dataset API规范保持一致。具体来说，jQuery 3 按照Dataset API的算法定义，将每个两个字符的序列“-”（U + 002D）转换为小写ASCII字母，再转换为大写字母。编写类似 $( "body" ).data( { "my-name": "aValue" } ).data(); 将返回 { myName: "aValue" } 。

trans-unit.source: A keypress event handler can be attached to any element, but the event is only sent to the element that has the focus. Focusable elements can vary between browsers, but form controls can always get focus so are reasonable candidates for this event type.
trans-unit.target: 甲 keypress 事件处理程序可以连接到任何元件，但事件只发送到具有焦点的元件。在浏览器之间，可聚焦元素可能会有所不同，但是表单控件始终能够获得焦点，因此是此事件类型的合理候选对象。

trans-unit.source: A scroll event is sent whenever the element's scroll position changes, regardless of the cause. A mouse click or drag on the scroll bar, dragging inside the element, pressing the arrow keys, or using the mouse's scroll wheel could cause this event.
trans-unit.target: 甲 scroll 每当元件的滚动位置的变化，不论其原因的被发送的事件。鼠标在滚动条上单击或拖动，在元素内拖动，按箭头键或使用鼠标的滚轮都可能导致此事件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean indicating whether event handlers and data should be copied along with the elements. The default value is false. *In jQuery 1.5.0 the default value was incorrectly true; it was changed back to false in 1.5.1 and up.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否应将事件处理程序和数据与元素一起复制。默认值为 false 。*在jQuery 1.5.0中，默认值错误地为 true ；在1.5.1及更高版本中将其更改回 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean indicating whether to place the animation in the effects queue. If false, the animation will begin immediately. As of jQuery 1.7, the queue option can also accept a string, in which case the animation is added to the queue represented by that string. When a custom queue name is used the animation does not automatically start; you must call .dequeue("queuename") to start it.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否将动画放置在效果队列中。如果为false，则动画将立即开始。从jQuery 1.7开始，queue选项还可以接受一个字符串，在这种情况下，动画将添加到该字符串表示的队列中。使用自定义队列名称时，动画不会自动开始。您必须调用 .dequeue("queuename") 来启动它。

trans-unit.source: A Deferred object starts in the pending state. Any callbacks added to the object with deferred.then(), deferred.always(), deferred.done(), or deferred.fail() are queued to be executed later. Calling deferred.resolve() or deferred.resolveWith() transitions the Deferred into the resolved state and immediately executes any doneCallbacks that are set. Calling deferred.reject() or deferred.rejectWith() transitions the Deferred into the rejected state and immediately executes any failCallbacks that are set. Once the object has entered the resolved or rejected state, it stays in that state. Callbacks can still be added to the resolved or rejected Deferred — they will execute immediately.
trans-unit.target: 延迟的对象以挂起状态开始。使用 deferred.then() ， deferred.always() ， deferred.done() 或 deferred.fail() 添加到对象的任何回调都将排队等待稍后执行。调用 deferred.resolve() 或 deferred.resolveWith() doneCallbacks Deferred转换为已解析状态，并立即执行设置的所有doneCallbacks。调用 deferred.reject() 或 deferred.rejectWith() failCallbacks Deferred转换为拒绝状态并立即执行任何failCallbacks被设置。对象进入已解析或拒绝状态后，它将保持该状态。回调仍可以添加到已解决或已拒绝的延迟中-它们将立即执行。

trans-unit.source: A callback function returning the HTML content or jQuery object to wrap around all the matched elements. Within the function, this refers to the first element in the set. Prior to jQuery 3.0, the callback was incorrectly called for every element in the set and received the index position of the element in the set as an argument.

trans-unit.source: A callback function returning the HTML content or jQuery object to wrap around the matched elements. Receives the index position of the element in the set as an argument. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.

trans-unit.target: 一个回调函数，该函数生成一个结构来包装匹配元素的内容。接收元素在集合中的索引位置作为参数。在函数内， this 指的是集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A callback is a plain JavaScript function passed to some method as an argument or option. Some callbacks are just events, called to give the user a chance to react when a certain state is triggered. jQuery's event system uses such callbacks everywhere:
trans-unit.target: 回调是一个普通的JavaScript函数,作为一个参数或选项传递给某个方法。有些回调只是事件,当某种状态被触发时,调用它给用户一个反应的机会,jQuery的事件系统到处都在使用这种回调。

trans-unit.source: A collection of properties that represent the presence of different browser features or bugs. Intended for jQuery’s internal use; specific properties may be removed when they are no longer needed internally to improve page startup performance. For your own project’s feature-detection needs, we strongly recommend the use of an external library such as Modernizr instead of dependency on properties in jQuery.support.
trans-unit.target: 表示存在不同浏览器功能或错误的属性的集合。旨在供jQuery内部使用；内部不再需要特定属性以提高页面启动性能时，可以将其删除。为了满足您自己项目的功能检测需求，我们强烈建议使用外部库（例如Modernizr），而不要依赖jQuery.support中的属性。

trans-unit.target: 开发人员尝试使用 .load() 快捷方式解决的一个常见挑战是，在完全加载图像（或图像集合）后执行函数。有几个已知的注意事项，应该注意。这些是：

trans-unit.source: A common pattern is to bind the mousemove handler from within a mousedown hander, and to unbind it from a corresponding mouseup handler. If implementing this sequence of events, remember that the mouseup event might be sent to a different HTML element than the mousemove event was. To account for this, the mouseup handler should typically be bound to an element high up in the DOM tree, such as <body>.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见的模式是将结合 mousemove 处理程序从一个内 mousedown 处理程序，并从相应的解除绑定 mouseup 处理程序。如果实现此事件序列，请记住 mouseup 事件可能会发送到与 mousemove 事件不同的HTML元素。为此，通常应将 mouseup 处理程序绑定到DOM树中较高位置的元素，例如 <body> 。

trans-unit.source: A descendant of an element could be a child, grandchild, great-grandchild, and so on, of that element.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素的子孙可以是该元素的子女、孙子、曾孙等。

trans-unit.source: A document in which context the code will be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 评估代码的上下文的文件。

trans-unit.source: A document in which the new elements will be created.
trans-unit.target: 一个文件,其中将创建新的元素。

trans-unit.source: A document object created by the browser's DOM parser, usually from a string representing HTML or XML.
trans-unit.target: 由浏览器的DOM解析器创建的文档对象,通常来自代表HTML或XML的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A document object created by the browser's XML DOM parser, usually from a string representing XML. XML documents have different semantics than HTML documents, but most of the traversing and manipulation methods provided by jQuery will work with them.
trans-unit.target: 一个由浏览器的XML DOM解析器创建的文档对象,通常是由一个代表XML的字符串创建的。XML文档与HTML文档的语义不同,但jQuery提供的大部分遍历和操作方法都可以使用。

trans-unit.source: A factory function that returns a chainable utility object with methods to register multiple callbacks into callback queues, invoke callback queues, and relay the success or failure state of any synchronous or asynchronous function.
trans-unit.target: 一个工厂函数,它返回一个可链式实用对象,其方法是将多个回调注册到回调队列中,调用回调队列,以及转发任何同步或异步函数的成功或失败状态。

trans-unit.source: A few of these methods—such as .attr(), .html(), and .val()—also act as "getters," retrieving information from DOM elements for later use.
trans-unit.target: 少数的这些方法，例如 .attr() ， .html() ，和 .val() -也充当“吸气剂”，从DOM元素以供稍后使用检索信息。

trans-unit.source: A float is a plain Number type, just as Integer, but whenever explicitly mentioned, indicates that a floating-point number is expected.
trans-unit.target: float是一个普通的Number类型,就像Integer一样,但只要明确提到,就表示预期是一个浮点数。

trans-unit.source: A function in JavaScript can be either named or anonymous. Any function can be assigned to a variable or passed to a method, but passing member functions this way can cause them to be called in the context of another object (i.e. with a different "this" object).
trans-unit.target: JavaScript中的函数可以是命名的,也可以是匿名的,任何函数都可以分配给一个变量或者传递给一个方法,但是这样传递成员函数会导致它们在另一个对象的上下文中被调用(即使用不同的 "this "对象)。任何函数都可以分配给一个变量或传递给一个方法,但这样传递成员函数会导致它们在另一个对象的上下文中被调用(即用不同的 "this "对象)。

trans-unit.source: A function object that will be invoked for each element in the current set.
trans-unit.target: 对当前集合中的每个元素都会被调用的函数对象。

trans-unit.source: A function returning one or more space-separated class names to be added to the existing class name(s). Receives the index position of the element in the set and the existing class name(s) as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 一种函数，该函数返回一个或多个以空格分隔的类名，以将其添加到现有的类名中。接收元素在集合中的索引位置以及现有的类名称作为参数。在函数内， this 指的是集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning one or more space-separated class names to be removed. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old class value as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个或多个以空格分隔的类名的函数。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧的类名作为参数。

trans-unit.source: A function returning one or more space-separated classes or an array of classes to be added to the existing class name(s). Receives the index position of the element in the set and the existing class name(s) as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个或多个用空格分隔的类或要添加到现有类名的类数组的函数。接收元素在集合中的索引位置以及现有的类名称作为参数。在函数内， this 是指集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning one or more space-separated classes or an array of classes to be removed. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old class value as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个或多个空间分隔的类或要删除的类数组的函数。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧的类值作为参数。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the HTML content to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old HTML value as arguments. jQuery empties the element before calling the function; use the oldhtml argument to reference the previous content. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回要设置的HTML内容。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧的HTML值作为参数。jQuery在调用函数之前先清空元素；使用oldhtml参数引用以前的内容。在函数内， this 指的是集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the height to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old height as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回要设置的高度。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧高度作为参数。在函数内， this 指的是集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the inner height (including padding but not border) to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old inner height as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 返回内部高度（包括填充但不包括边框）的函数。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧的内部高度作为参数。在函数内， this 指的是集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the inner width (including padding but not border) to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old inner width as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回内部宽度（包括填充，但不包括边框）以进行设置。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧的内部宽度作为参数。在函数内， this 指的是集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the outer height to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old outer height as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回外部高度进行设置。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧的外部高度作为参数。在函数内， this 指的是集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the outer width to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old outer width as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回外部宽度进行设置。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧的外部宽度作为参数。在函数内， this 指的是集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the text content to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old text value as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回设置的文本内容的函数。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧文本值作为参数。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the value to set. this is the current element. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old attribute value as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回要设置的值。 this 是当前元素。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧的属性值作为参数。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the value to set. this is the current element. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old value as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回要设置的值。 this 是当前元素。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧值作为参数。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the value to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old property value as arguments. Within the function, the keyword this refers to the current element.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回要设置的值。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧属性值作为参数。在函数中，关键字 this 指向当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function returning the width to set. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old width as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回要设置的宽度。接收元素在集合中的索引位置和旧宽度作为参数。在函数内， this 是指集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns an HTML string, DOM element(s), text node(s), or jQuery object to insert after each element in the set of matched elements. Receives the index position of the element in the set as an argument. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个HTML字符串，DOM元素，文本节点或jQuery对象，以插入匹配元素集中的每个元素之后。接收元素在集合中的索引位置作为参数。在函数内， this 是指集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns an HTML string, DOM element(s), text node(s), or jQuery object to insert at the beginning of each element in the set of matched elements. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old HTML value of the element as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回HTML字符串，DOM元素，文本节点或jQuery对象，以插入到匹配元素集中的每个元素的开头。接收元素在集合中的索引位置以及元素的旧HTML值作为参数。在函数内， this 是指集合中的当前元素。

Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old HTML value of the element as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回HTML字符串，DOM元素，文本节点或jQuery对象，以插入到匹配元素集中的每个元素的末尾。接收元素在集合中的索引位置以及元素的旧HTML值作为参数。在函数内， this 是指集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns an HTML string, DOM element(s), text node(s), or jQuery object to insert before each element in the set of matched elements. Receives the index position of the element in the set and the old HTML value of the element as arguments. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个HTML字符串，DOM元素，文本节点或jQuery对象，以插入匹配元素集中的每个元素之前。接收元素在集合中的索引位置以及元素的旧HTML值作为参数。在函数内， this 是指集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns an HTML string, DOM element(s), text node(s), or jQuery object to insert before each element in the set of matched elements. Receives the index position of the element in the set as an argument. Within the function, this refers to the current element in the set.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个HTML字符串，DOM元素，文本节点或jQuery对象，以插入匹配元素集中的每个元素之前。接收元素在集合中的索引位置作为参数。在函数内， this 是指集合中的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns class names to be toggled in the class attribute of each element in the matched set. Receives the index position of the element in the set, the old class value, and the state as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 一个函数,返回匹配集合中每个元素的类属性中要切换的类名。接收元素在集合中的索引位置、旧的类值和状态作为参数。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns content with which to replace the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个返回内容的函数,用来替换匹配的元素集。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns one or more space-separated classes or an array of classes to be toggled in the class attribute of each element in the matched set. Receives the index position of the element in the set, the old class value, and the state as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 一个函数,返回一个或多个空间分隔的类或类的数组,以便在匹配集中每个元素的类属性中进行切换。接收元素在集合中的索引位置、旧类值和状态作为参数。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called after each step of the animation, only once per animated element regardless of the number of animated properties. (version added: 1.8)
trans-unit.target: 在动画的每个步骤之后要调用的函数，每个动画元素仅调用一次，而不管动画属性的数量如何。（添加的版本：1.8）

trans-unit.source: A function to be called for each animated property of each animated element. This function provides an opportunity to modify the Tween object to change the value of the property before it is set.
trans-unit.target: 为每个动画元素的每个动画属性调用的函数。该函数提供了一个修改Tween对象的机会,以便在属性设置之前改变其值。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called if the request fails. The function receives three arguments: The jqXHR (in jQuery 1.4.x, XMLHttpRequest) object, a string describing the type of error that occurred and an optional exception object, if one occurred. Possible values for the second argument (besides null) are "timeout", "error", "abort", and "parsererror". When an HTTP error occurs, errorThrown receives the textual portion of the HTTP status, such as "Not Found" or "Internal Server Error." (in HTTP/2 it may instead be an empty string) As of jQuery 1.5, the error setting can accept an array of functions. Each function will be called in turn. Note:This handler is not called for cross-domain script and cross-domain JSONP requests. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求失败，将调用的函数。该函数接收三个参数：jqXHR对象（在jQuery 1.4.x中为XMLHttpRequest），一个描述错误类型的字符串，以及一个可选的异常对象（如果发生）。第二个参数（除 null 之外）的可能值为 "timeout" ， "error" ， "abort" 和 "parsererror" 。发生HTTP错误时， errorThrown 会接收HTTP状态的文本部分，例如“未找到”或“内部服务器错误”。 （在HTTP / 2中，它可能改为是空字符串）从jQuery 1.5开始， error 设置可以接受函数数组。每个函数将依次调用。注意：对于跨域脚本和跨域JSONP请求，不会调用此处理程序。这是一个Ajax事件。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called if the request fails. The function receives three arguments: The jqXHR (in jQuery 1.4.x, XMLHttpRequest) object, a string describing the type of error that occurred and an optional exception object, if one occurred. Possible values for the second argument (besides null) are "timeout", "error", "abort", and "parsererror". When an HTTP error occurs, errorThrown receives the textual portion of the HTTP status, such as "Not Found" or "Internal Server Error." As of jQuery 1.5, the error setting can accept an array of functions. Each function will be called in turn. Note:This handler is not called for cross-domain script and cross-domain JSONP requests. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 请求失败时要调用的函数。该函数接收三个参数：jqXHR对象（在jQuery 1.4.x中为XMLHttpRequest），一个描述发生错误的类型的字符串，以及一个可选的异常对象（如果发生）。第二个参数（除 null 外）的可能值为 "timeout" ， "error" ， "abort" 和 "parsererror" 。发生HTTP错误时， errorThrown 会接收HTTP状态的文本部分，例如“未找到”或“内部服务器错误”。从jQuery 1.5开始， error 设置可以接受函数数组。每个函数将依次调用。注意：跨域脚本和跨域JSONP请求不会调用此处理程序。这是一个Ajax事件。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called if the request succeeds. The function gets passed three arguments: The data returned from the server, formatted according to the dataType parameter or the dataFilter callback function, if specified; a string describing the status; and the jqXHR (in jQuery 1.4.x, XMLHttpRequest) object. As of jQuery 1.5, the success setting can accept an array of functions. Each function will be called in turn. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 请求成功时要调用的函数。该函数传递了三个参数：从服务器返回的数据，根据 dataType 参数或 dataFilter 回调函数（如果已指定）进行了格式化；描述状态的字符串；和 jqXHR 对象（在jQuery 1.4.x中为XMLHttpRequest）。从jQuery 1.5开始，成功设置可以接受一系列函数。每个函数将依次调用。这是一个Ajax事件。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called when the animation on an element completes (its Promise object is resolved). (version added: 1.8)
trans-unit.target: 当元素上的动画完成（解析其Promise对象）时要调用的函数。（添加的版本：1.8）

trans-unit.source: A function to be called when the animation on an element completes or stops without completing (its Promise object is either resolved or rejected). (version added: 1.8)
trans-unit.target: 当元素上的动画完成或停止而没有完成时（其Promise对象已解析或拒绝）而调用的函数。（添加的版本：1.8）

trans-unit.source: A function to be called when the animation on an element fails to complete (its Promise object is rejected). (version added: 1.8)
trans-unit.target: 当元素上的动画未能完成（拒绝其Promise对象）时要调用的函数。（添加的版本：1.8）

trans-unit.source: A function to be called when the request finishes (after success and error callbacks are executed). The function gets passed two arguments: The jqXHR (in jQuery 1.4.x, XMLHTTPRequest) object and a string categorizing the status of the request ("success", "notmodified", "nocontent", "error", "timeout", "abort", or "parsererror"). As of jQuery 1.5, the complete setting can accept an array of functions. Each function will be called in turn. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 请求完成时（执行 success 和 error 回调之后）将调用的函数。该函数传递了两个参数：jqXHR对象（在jQuery 1.4.x中为XMLHTTPRequest）和一个对请求状态进行分类的字符串（ "success" ， "notmodified" ， "nocontent" ， "error" ， "timeout" ， "abort" 或 "parsererror" ）。从jQuery 1.5开始， complete 设置可以接受函数数组。每个函数将依次调用。这是一个Ajax事件。

trans-unit.source: A function to be used to handle the raw response data of XMLHttpRequest. This is a pre-filtering function to sanitize the response. You should return the sanitized data. The function accepts two arguments: The raw data returned from the server and the 'dataType' parameter.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理XMLHttpRequest的原始响应数据的函数。这是一个预过滤函数,用于对响应数据进行消毒。你应该返回净化后的数据。该函数接受两个参数。从服务器返回的原始数据和'dataType'参数。

trans-unit.source: A function to call once the animation is complete, called once per matched element.
trans-unit.target: 动画完成后调用的函数,每个匹配元素调用一次。

trans-unit.source: A function to call once the animation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 动画完成后调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to call when the animation on an element begins. (version added: 1.8)
trans-unit.target: 当元素上的动画开始时要调用的函数。（添加的版本：1.8）

trans-unit.source: A function to execute after the DOM is ready.
trans-unit.target: 在DOM准备好后执行的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to execute at the time the event is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 触发事件时要执行的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 每次触发事件时要执行的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to execute every even time the element is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 每当元素被点击时执行的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to execute every odd time the element is clicked.

trans-unit.source: A function to execute for each matched element.

trans-unit.source: A function to execute when the event is triggered.

trans-unit.source: A function to execute when the mouse pointer enters or leaves the element.

trans-unit.source: A function to return the coordinates to set. Receives the index of the element in the collection as the first argument and the current coordinates as the second argument. The function should return an object with the new top and left properties.
trans-unit.target: 返回设置坐标的功能。接收集合中元素的索引作为第一个参数，而当前坐标作为第二个参数。该函数应返回一个具有新的 top 和 left 属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: A function used as a test for each element in the set. this is the current DOM element.

trans-unit.source: A function used as a test for each element in the set. It accepts two arguments, index, which is the element's index in the jQuery collection, and element, which is the DOM element. Within the function, this refers to the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试集合中每个元素的函数。它接受两个参数， index 是jQuery集合中元素的索引，而 element 是DOM元素。在函数内， this 是指当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: A function used as a test for every element in the set. It accepts two arguments, index, which is the element's index in the jQuery collection, and element, which is the DOM element. Within the function, this refers to the current DOM element.

trans-unit.source: A function, or array of functions, called when the Deferred is rejected.

trans-unit.source: A generic iterator function, which can be used to seamlessly iterate over both objects and arrays. Arrays and array-like objects with a length property (such as a function’s arguments object) are iterated by numeric index, from 0 to length-1. Other objects are iterated via their named properties.
trans-unit.target: 通用迭代器函数，可用于无缝迭代对象和数组。具有长度属性的数组和类似数组的对象（例如函数的arguments对象）通过从0到length-1的数字索引进行迭代。其他对象通过其命名属性进行迭代。

trans-unit.source: A handler can also be removed by specifying the function name in the handler argument. When jQuery attaches an event handler, it assigns a unique id to the handler function. Handlers proxied by jQuery.proxy() or a similar mechanism will all have the same unique id (the proxy function), so passing proxied handlers to .off may remove more handlers than intended. In those situations it is better to attach and remove event handlers using namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 还可以通过在 handler 参数中指定函数名称来删除处理程序。当jQuery附加事件处理程序时，它将为处理程序函数分配一个唯一的ID。由 jQuery.proxy() 或类似机制代理的处理程序都将具有相同的唯一ID（代理函数），因此将代理处理程序传递给 .off 可能会删除比预期更多的处理程序。在这种情况下，最好使用名称空间附加和删除事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A handler function previously attached for the event(s), or the special value false.
trans-unit.target: 先前为事件附加的处理函数，或特殊值 false 。

trans-unit.source: A handler to return the new transport object to use with the data type provided in the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 用于返回新的传输对象的处理程序,以便与第一个参数中提供的数据类型一起使用。

trans-unit.source: A handler to set default values for future Ajax requests.
trans-unit.target: 用于为未来的Ajax请求设置默认值的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A jQuery object contains a collection of Document Object Model (DOM) elements that have been created from an HTML string or selected from a document. Since jQuery methods often use CSS selectors to match elements from a document, the set of elements in a jQuery object is often called a set of "matched elements" or "selected elements".
trans-unit.target: 一个jQuery对象包含一个文档对象模型(DOM)元素的集合,这些元素是从一个HTML字符串中创建的,或者是从一个文档中选择的。由于jQuery方法经常使用CSS选择器来匹配文档中的元素,所以jQuery对象中的元素集通常被称为 "匹配元素 "或 "选择元素"。

trans-unit.source: A jQuery object may be empty, containing no DOM elements. You can create an empty jQuery object with $() (that is, passing no arguments at all). A jQuery object may also be empty if a selector doesn't select any elements, or if a chained method filters out all the elements. It is not an error; any further methods called on that jQuery object simply have no effect since they have no elements to act upon. So, in this example if there are no bad entries on the page then no elements will be colored red:
trans-unit.target: jQuery对象可能为空，不包含DOM元素。您可以使用 $() 创建一个空的jQuery对象（即，完全不传递任何参数）。如果选择器没有选择任何元素，或者如果链式方法过滤掉了所有元素，则jQuery对象也可能为空。这不是错误；由于没有任何可操作的元素，因此对该jQuery对象调用的任何其他方法都根本无效。因此，在此示例中，如果页面上没有不良条目，则没有元素将被涂成红色：

trans-unit.source: A multi-purpose object that provides a powerful way to manage callback lists. It supports adding, removing, firing, and disabling callbacks. The Callbacks object is created and returned by the $.Callbacks function and subsequently returned by most of that function's methods.

trans-unit.source: A selector is used in jQuery to select DOM elements from a DOM document. That document is, in most cases, the DOM document present in all browsers, but can also be an XML document received via Ajax.

trans-unit.source: A set of key/value pairs that configure the Ajax request. All properties except for url are optional. A default can be set for any option with $.ajaxSetup(). See jQuery.ajax( settings ) for a complete list of all settings. The type option will automatically be set to GET.

trans-unit.source: A string in JavaScript has some built-in methods to manipulate the string, though the result is always a new string - or something else, eg. split returns an array.

trans-unit.source: A string in JavaScript is an immutable primitive value that contains none, one or many characters.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript中的字符串是一个不可改变的基元值,它包含无、一个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: A string indicating which easing function to use for the transition.

trans-unit.source: A string is designated htmlString in jQuery documentation when it is used to represent one or more DOM elements, typically to be created and inserted in the document. When passed as an argument of the jQuery() function, the string is identified as HTML if it starts with <tag ... >) and is parsed as such until the final > character. Prior to jQuery 1.9, a string was considered to be HTML if it contained <tag ... >anywhere within the string.
trans-unit.target: 当一个字符串用于表示一个或多个通常要在文档中创建并插入的DOM元素时，在jQuery文档中将其指定为htmlString。当作为 jQuery() 函数的参数传递时，如果该字符串以 <tag ... > 开头，则被标识为HTML ，并被解析为最终的 > 字符。在jQuery 1.9之前，如果字符串在字符串中的任何位置包含 <tag ... > ，则该字符串被视为HTML 。

trans-unit.source: Added to jQuery in version 1.4, the .delay() method allows us to delay the execution of functions that follow it in the queue. It can be used with the standard effects queue or with a custom queue. Only subsequent events in a queue are delayed; for example this will not delay the no-arguments forms of .show() or .hide() which do not use the effects queue.
trans-unit.target: .delay() 方法在1.4版中添加到jQuery中，使我们能够延迟队列中跟在其后的函数的执行。它可以与标准效果队列或自定义队列一起使用。只有队列中的后续事件才被延迟；例如，这将不延迟的无参数形式 .show() 或 .hide() 不使用影响排队。

trans-unit.source: Ajax requests are time-limited, so errors can be caught and handled to provide a better user experience. Request timeouts are usually either left at their default or set as a global default using $.ajaxSetup() rather than being overridden for specific requests with the timeout option.
trans-unit.target: Ajax请求是有时间限制的，因此可以捕获和处理错误以提供更好的用户体验。请求超时通常保留为默认值，或者使用 $.ajaxSetup() 设置为全局默认值，而不是使用 timeout 选项为特定请求覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Ajax requests produce a number of different events that you can subscribe to. Here's a full list of the events and in what order they are triggered.
trans-unit.target: Ajax请求会产生许多不同的事件,您可以订阅这些事件。以下是这些事件的完整列表,以及它们被触发的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Alert "this is WebKit!" only for WebKit browsers. Will not work in jQuery 1.9 or later unless the jQuery Migrate plugin is included.
trans-unit.target: 警报“这是WebKit！” 仅适用于WebKit浏览器。除非包含jQuery Migrate插件，否则将无法在jQuery 1.9或更高版本中使用。

trans-unit.target: 提醒正在使用的IE渲染引擎的版本。除非包含jQuery Migrate插件，否则将无法在jQuery 1.9或更高版本中使用。

Each time an ajaxComplete handler is executed, it is passed the event object, the XMLHttpRequest object, and the settings object that was used in the creation of the request. For example, you can restrict the callback to only handling events dealing with a particular URL:

trans-unit.source: All ajaxError handlers are invoked, regardless of what Ajax request was completed. To differentiate between the requests, use the parameters passed to the handler. Each time an ajaxError handler is executed, it is passed the event object, the jqXHR object (prior to jQuery 1.5, the XHR object), and the settings object that was used in the creation of the request. When an HTTP error occurs, the fourth argument (thrownError) receives the textual portion of the HTTP status, such as "Not Found" or "Internal Server Error." For example, to restrict the error callback to only handling events dealing with a particular URL:
trans-unit.target: 无论完成了什么Ajax请求，都将调用所有 ajaxError 处理程序。为了区分请求，请使用传递给处理程序的参数。每次执行 ajaxError 处理程序时，都会向其传递事件对象， jqXHR 对象（jQuery 1.5之前的 XHR 对象）以及在创建请求时使用的设置对象。发生HTTP错误时，第四个参数（ thrownError ）接收HTTP状态的文本部分，例如“未找到”或“内部服务器错误”。例如，将错误回调限制为仅处理与特定URL有关的事件：

For example, you can restrict the callback to only handling events dealing with a particular URL:

trans-unit.source: All animated properties should be animated to a single numeric value, except as noted below; most properties that are non-numeric cannot be animated using basic jQuery functionality (For example, width, height, or left can be animated but background-color cannot be, unless the jQuery.Color plugin is used). Property values are treated as a number of pixels unless otherwise specified. The units em and % can be specified where applicable.
trans-unit.target: 除以下所述外，所有动画属性均应设置为单个数值。大多数非数字属性不能使用基本的jQuery功能进行动画处理（例如，可以对 width ， height 或 left 进行动画处理，而不能对 background-color 进行动画处理，除非使用jQuery.Color插件）。除非另有说明，否则属性值被视为像素数。可以在适当的地方指定单位 em 和 % 。

trans-unit.source: All event handlers in jQuery are called with the handling element as the context.
trans-unit.target: jQuery中所有的事件处理程序都是以处理元素作为上下文来调用的。

trans-unit.source: All jQuery effects, including .animate(), can be turned off globally by setting jQuery.fx.off = true, which effectively sets the duration to 0. For more information, see jQuery.fx.off.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置 jQuery.fx.off = true 来全局关闭所有jQuery效果（包括 .animate() )，该设置可以将持续时间有效地设置为0。有关更多信息，请参见jQuery.fx.off。

trans-unit.source: All jQuery effects, including .slideDown(), can be turned off globally by setting jQuery.fx.off = true, which effectively sets the duration to 0. For more information, see jQuery.fx.off.

trans-unit.source: All jQuery effects, including .slideUp(), can be turned off globally by setting jQuery.fx.off = true, which effectively sets the duration to 0. For more information, see jQuery.fx.off.

trans-unit.source: All jQuery effects, including .toggle(), can be turned off globally by setting jQuery.fx.off = true, which effectively sets the duration to 0. For more information, see jQuery.fx.off.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置 jQuery.fx.off = true 来全局关闭所有jQuery效果（包括 .toggle() )，该设置可以将持续时间有效地设置为0。有关更多信息，请参见jQuery.fx.off。

trans-unit.source: All objects have a prototype property. Whenever the interpreter looks for a property, it also checks in the object's prototype if the property is not found on the object itself. jQuery uses the prototype extensively to add methods to jQuery instances. Internally, jQuery makes jQuery.fn an alias of jQuery.prototype so you can use either one (though plugin developers have standardized on fn).
trans-unit.target: 所有对象都具有原型属性。每当解释器寻找属性时，它还会检查对象的原型是否在对象本身上找不到该属性。 jQuery广泛使用该原型向jQuery实例添加方法。在内部，jQuery使 jQuery.fn 成为 jQuery.prototype 的别名，因此您可以使用其中任何一个（尽管插件开发人员已在 fn 上进行了标准化）。

trans-unit.source: All of the following jQuery code will work.
trans-unit.target: 以下所有的jQuery代码都可以使用。

trans-unit.source: All of the matched DOM nodes are returned by this call, contained in a standard array:
trans-unit.target: 所有匹配的DOM节点都被这个调用返回,包含在一个标准数组中。

trans-unit.source: All of the methods in this section manipulate the DOM in some manner. A few of them simply change one of the attributes of an element (also listed in the Attributes category), while others set an element's style properties (also listed in the CSS category). Still others modify entire elements (or groups of elements) themselves—inserting, copying, removing, and so on. All of these methods are referred to as "setters," as they change the values of properties.
trans-unit.target: 本节中的所有方法都以某种方式操作DOM。其中一些仅更改元素的属性之一（也列在Attributes类别中），而其他一些设置元素的样式属性（也列在CSS类别中）。还有一些人自己修改整个元素（或元素组）—插入，复制，删除等等。所有这些方法均会更改属性值，因此称为“设置器”。

trans-unit.source: All selector ("*")
trans-unit.target: 所有选择器（“ *”）

trans-unit.target: :not() 内部接受所有选择器，例如 :not(div a) 和 :not(div,a) 。

trans-unit.source: All strings have a length property.
trans-unit.target: 所有的字符串都有一个长度属性。

trans-unit.source: All subsequent Ajax calls using any function will use the new settings, unless overridden by the individual calls, until the next invocation of $.ajaxSetup().
trans-unit.target: 除非由单个调用覆盖，否则所有随后使用任何函数进行的Ajax调用都将使用新设置，直到下次调用 $.ajaxSetup() 为止。

trans-unit.source: Allow the current environment to be recognized as "local," (e.g. the filesystem), even if jQuery does not recognize it as such by default. The following protocols are currently recognized as local: file, *-extension, and widget. If the isLocal setting needs modification, it is recommended to do so once in the $.ajaxSetup() method. (version added: 1.5.1)
trans-unit.target: 即使jQuery默认情况下也不会将当前环境识别为“本地”（例如文件系统）。当前将以下协议识别为本地协议： file ， *-extension 和 widget 。如果 isLocal 设置需要修改，建议在 $.ajaxSetup() 方法中进行一次修改。（添加的版本：1.5.1）

trans-unit.source: Allow the request to be successful only if the response has changed since the last request. This is done by checking the Last-Modified header. Default value is false, ignoring the header. In jQuery 1.4 this technique also checks the 'etag' specified by the server to catch unmodified data.
trans-unit.target: 仅自上次请求以来响应已更改，才允许请求成功。这是通过检查Last-Modified标头完成的。默认值为 false ，忽略标题。在jQuery 1.4中，此技术还会检查服务器指定的“ etag”以捕获未修改的数据。

trans-unit.source: Also, jQuery can equally interpret the CSS and DOM formatting of multiple-word properties. For example, jQuery understands and returns the correct value for both .css( "background-color" ) and .css( "backgroundColor" ). This means mixed case has a special meaning, .css( "WiDtH" ) won't do the same as .css( "width" ), for example.
trans-unit.target: 同样，jQuery可以同等地解释多词属性的CSS和DOM格式。例如，jQuery理解并返回 .css( "background-color" ) 和 .css( "backgroundColor" ) 的正确值。这意味着混合大小写具有特殊含义，例如， .css( "WiDtH" ) 与 .css( "width" ) 不会一样。

trans-unit.source: Also, jQuery can equally interpret the CSS and DOM formatting of multiple-word properties. For example, jQuery understands and returns the correct value for both .css({ "background-color": "#ffe", "border-left": "5px solid #ccc" }) and .css({backgroundColor: "#ffe", borderLeft: "5px solid #ccc" }). Notice that with the DOM notation, quotation marks around the property names are optional, but with CSS notation they're required due to the hyphen in the name.
trans-unit.target: 同样，jQuery可以同等地解释多词属性的CSS和DOM格式。例如，jQuery会理解并返回 .css({ "background-color": "#ffe", "border-left": "5px solid #ccc" }) 和 .css({backgroundColor: "#ffe", borderLeft: "5px solid #ccc" }) 。请注意，对于DOM表示法，属性名称周围的引号是可选的，但对于CSS表示法，由于名称中的连字符，因此必须使用引号。

trans-unit.source: Although their resulting selections are usually the same, :enabled selector is subtly different from :not([disabled]); :enabled selects elements that have their boolean disabled property strictly equal to false, while :not([disabled]) selects elements that do not have a disabled attribute set (regardless of its value).
trans-unit.target: 尽管它们产生的选择通常相同，但 :enabled 选择器与 :not([disabled]) 略有不同。 :enabled 选择其布尔禁用属性严格等于false的元素，而 :not([disabled]) 选择未设置禁用属性（无论其值如何）的元素。

trans-unit.source: Although their resulting selections are usually the same, the :disabled selector is subtly different from the [disabled] attribute selector;:disabled matches elements that are actually disabled while [disabled] only checks for the existence of the disabled attribute.
trans-unit.target: 尽管它们产生的选择通常是相同的，但 :disabled 选择器与 [disabled] 属性选择器有细微差别。 :disabled 匹配实际上已禁用的元素，而 [disabled] 仅检查是否已禁用属性。

trans-unit.source: An element in the Document Object Model (DOM) can have attributes, text, and children. It provides methods to traverse the parent and children and to get access to its attributes. Due to inconsistencies in DOM API specifications and implementations, however, those methods can be a challenge to use. jQuery provides a "wrapper" around those elements to help interacting with the DOM. But sometimes you will be working directly with DOM elements, or see methods that (also) accept DOM elements as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 文档对象模型(DOM)中的一个元素可以有属性、文本和子元素。它提供的方法可以遍历父元素和子元素,并获得对其属性的访问。由于DOM API规范和实现的不一致,然而,这些方法可能是一个挑战,jQuery提供了一个围绕这些元素的 "包装器",以帮助与DOM交互。但有时你会直接与DOM元素一起工作,或者看到一些方法(也)接受DOM元素作为参数。

trans-unit.source: An event name can be qualified by event namespaces that simplify removing or triggering the event. For example, "click.myPlugin.simple" defines both the myPlugin and simple namespaces for this particular click event. A click event handler attached via that string could be removed with .off("click.myPlugin") or .off("click.simple") without disturbing other click handlers attached to the elements. Namespaces are similar to CSS classes in that they are not hierarchical; only one name needs to match. Namespaces beginning with an underscore are reserved for jQuery's use.
trans-unit.target: 事件名称可以由事件名称空间限定，该名称空间简化了删除或触发事件的过程。例如， "click.myPlugin.simple" 为此特定的click事件定义了myPlugin和简单名称空间。通过该字符串附加点击事件处理程序可以与被除去 .off("click.myPlugin") 或 .off("click.simple") ，而不会干扰连接到元件之外的点击处理程序。命名空间与CSS类类似，因为它们不是分层的。只有一个名称需要匹配。以下划线开头的命名空间保留给jQuery使用。

trans-unit.source: An event name can be qualified by event namespaces that simplify removing or triggering the event. For example, "click.myPlugin.simple" defines both the myPlugin and simple namespaces for this particular click event. A click event handler attached via that string could be removed with .off("click.myPlugin") or .off("click.simple") without disturbing other click handlers attached to the elements. Namespaces are similar to CSS classes in that they are not hierarchical; only one name needs to match. Namespaces should contain upper/lowercase letters and digits only.
trans-unit.target: 事件名称可以由事件名称空间限定，该名称空间简化了删除或触发事件的过程。例如， "click.myPlugin.simple" 为此特定的click事件定义了myPlugin和简单名称空间。通过该字符串附加点击事件处理程序可以与被除去 .off("click.myPlugin") 或 .off("click.simple") ，而不会干扰连接到元件之外的点击处理程序。命名空间与CSS类类似，因为它们不是分层的。只有一个名称需要匹配。命名空间应仅包含大写/小写字母和数字。

trans-unit.source: An object of additional header key/value pairs to send along with requests using the XMLHttpRequest transport. The header X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest is always added, but its default XMLHttpRequest value can be changed here. Values in the headers setting can also be overwritten from within the beforeSend function. (version added: 1.5)
trans-unit.target: 使用XMLHttpRequest传输与请求一起发送的附加标头键/值对的对象。始终会添加标头 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest ，但是可以在此处更改其默认 XMLHttpRequest 值。在价值观 headers 的设置也可以从内部被覆盖 beforeSend 功能。（添加的版本：1.5）

trans-unit.source: Animate all paragraphs and execute a callback function when the animation is complete. The first argument is an object of CSS properties, the second specifies that the animation should take 1000 milliseconds to complete, the third states the easing type, and the fourth argument is an anonymous callback function.
trans-unit.target: 将所有段落动画化,并在动画完成后执行一个回调函数。第一个参数是CSS属性的对象,第二个参数指定动画要用1000毫秒完成,第三个参数说明缓和类型,第四个参数是一个匿名回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Animate all paragraphs to a left style of 50 and opacity of 1 (opaque, visible), completing the animation within 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 将所有段落动画化为左风格为50,不透明度为1(不透明,可见),在500毫秒内完成动画。

trans-unit.source: Animate all paragraphs to toggle both height and opacity, completing the animation within 600 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 对所有段落进行动画,同时切换高度和不透明度,在600毫秒内完成动画。

trans-unit.source: Animate the hiding and showing of two divs, delaying the first before showing it.
trans-unit.target: 为两个divs的隐藏和显示添加动画,在显示之前,延迟第一个divs。

trans-unit.source: Animate the left and opacity style properties of all paragraphs; run the animation outside the queue, so that it will automatically start without waiting for its turn.
trans-unit.target: 对所有段落的left和opacity样式属性进行动画处理；在队列外运行动画，以便动画自动开始而无需等待轮到。

trans-unit.target: 动画属性也可以是相对的。如果为值提供了前导 += 或 -= 字符序列，则通过从属性的当前值中加上或减去给定的数字来计算目标值。

trans-unit.source: Animates all paragraphs to be shown if they are hidden and hidden if they are visible, completing the animation within 600 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果隐藏了所有段落,则将其显示,如果可见则将其隐藏,在600毫秒内完成动画。

trans-unit.source: Animates all paragraphs to fade out, completing the animation within 600 milliseconds.

trans-unit.source: Any unload event handler should be bound to the window object:
trans-unit.target: 任何 unload 事件处理程序都应绑定到 window 对象：

trans-unit.source: Any event handlers attached with .on() or one of its shortcut methods are triggered when the corresponding event occurs. They can be fired manually, however, with the .trigger() method. A call to .trigger() executes the handlers in the same order they would be if the event were triggered naturally by the user:
trans-unit.target: 发生相应事件时，将触发附加有 .on() 或其快捷方式之一的任何事件处理程序。但是，可以使用 .trigger() 方法手动将其触发。调用 .trigger() 会以与事件由用户自然触发的顺序相同的顺序执行处理程序：

trans-unit.source: Any event names can be used for the events argument. jQuery will pass through the browser's standard JavaScript event types, calling the handler function when the browser generates events due to user actions such as click. In addition, the .trigger() method can trigger both standard browser event names and custom event names to call attached handlers. Event names should only contain alphanumerics, underscore, and colon characters.
trans-unit.target: 任何事件名称都可以用于 events 参数。 jQuery将通过浏览器的标准JavaScript事件类型，在浏览器由于诸如 click 之类的用户操作而生成事件时调用 handler 函数。此外， .trigger() 方法可以触发标准浏览器事件名称和自定义事件名称，以调用附加的处理程序。事件名称应仅包含字母数字，下划线和冒号字符。

trans-unit.source: Any handler that has been attached with .live() can be removed with .die(). This method is analogous to calling .off() with no arguments, which is used to remove all handlers attached with .on(). See the discussions of .live() and .off() for further details.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 .die() 删除任何已附加 .live() 的处理程序。此方法类似于不带任何参数调用 .off() ，该方法用于删除所有与 .on() 关联的处理程序。有关更多详细信息，请参见 .live() 和 .off() 的讨论。

trans-unit.source: Any string is legal for eventType; if the string is not the name of a native DOM event, then the handler is bound to a custom event. These events are never called by the browser, but may be triggered manually from other JavaScript code using .trigger() or .triggerHandler().
trans-unit.target: 任何字符串对于 eventType 都是合法的；如果字符串不是本机DOM事件的名称，则将处理程序绑定到自定义事件。这些事件永远不会被浏览器调用，但是可以使用 .trigger() 或 .triggerHandler() 从其他JavaScript代码手动触发。

trans-unit.source: Array-like objects — those with a .length property and a value on the .length - 1 index — must be converted to actual arrays before being passed to $.map(). The jQuery library provides $.makeArray() for such conversions.

trans-unit.source: Arrays in JavaScript are mutable lists with a few built-in methods. You can define arrays using the array literal:
trans-unit.target: JavaScript中的数组是具有一些内置方法的可突变列表。你可以使用数组文字定义数组。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative or in addition to the data argument provided to the .on() method, you can also pass data to an event handler using a second argument to .trigger() or .triggerHandler(). Data provided this way is passed to the event handler as further parameters after the Event object. If an array was passed to the second argument of .trigger() or .triggerHandler(), each element in the array will be presented to the event handler as an individual parameter.
trans-unit.target: 作为提供给 .on() 方法的 data 参数的替代或补充，您还可以使用 .trigger() 或 .triggerHandler() 的第二个参数将数据传递给事件处理程序。以这种方式提供的数据将作为 Event 对象之后的其他参数传递给事件处理程序。如果将数组传递给 .trigger() 或 .triggerHandler() 的第二个参数，则该数组中的每个元素将作为一个单独的参数呈现给事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: As described in the discussion for .end(), jQuery objects maintain an internal stack that keeps track of changes to the matched set of elements. When one of the DOM traversal methods is called, the new set of elements is pushed onto the stack. If the previous set of elements is desired as well, .addBack() can help.
trans-unit.target: 如对 .end() 的讨论中所述，jQuery对象维护一个内部堆栈，该堆栈跟踪对匹配的元素集所做的更改。当调用DOM遍历方法之一时，新的元素集被压入堆栈。如果还需要前面的元素集，则 .addBack() 可以提供帮助。

trans-unit.source: As described in the discussion for .end(), jQuery objects maintain an internal stack that keeps track of changes to the matched set of elements. When one of the DOM traversal methods is called, the new set of elements is pushed onto the stack. If the previous set of elements is desired as well, .andSelf() can help.
trans-unit.target: 如对 .end() 的讨论中所述，jQuery对象维护一个内部堆栈，该堆栈可跟踪对匹配元素集的更改。当调用DOM遍历方法之一时，新的元素集被压入堆栈。如果也需要前面的元素集， .andSelf() 可以提供帮助。

trans-unit.source: As of 3.0 the default behavior is changed. If the context is not specified or given as null or undefined, a new document is used. This can potentially improve security because inline events will not execute when the HTML is parsed. Once the parsed HTML is injected into a document it does execute, but this gives tools a chance to traverse the created DOM and remove anything deemed unsafe. This improvement does not apply to internal uses of jQuery.parseHTML as they usually pass in the current document. Therefore, a statement like $( "#log" ).append( $( htmlString ) ) is still subject to the injection of malicious code.
trans-unit.target: 从3.0开始，默认行为已更改。如果未指定 context 或将其指定为 null 或 undefined ，则使用新 document 。这可能会提高安全性，因为在解析HTML时不会执行内联事件。将解析的HTML注入文档后，它便会执行，但这为工具提供了遍历创建的DOM并删除任何不安全内容的机会。此改进不适用于 jQuery.parseHTML 的内部使用，因为它们通常会在当前 document 传递。因此，像 $( "#log" ).append( $( htmlString ) ) 这样的语句仍然会受到恶意代码的注入。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4 the .live() method supports custom events as well as all JavaScript events that bubble. It also supports certain events that don't bubble, including change, submit, focus and blur.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .live() 方法支持自定义事件以及所有冒泡的JavaScript事件。它还支持某些不会冒泡的事件，包括 change ， submit ， focus 和 blur 。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.12/2.2, this behavior is changed to improve the support for XML documents, including SVG. Starting from this version, the classattribute is used instead. So, .addClass() can be used on XML or SVG documents.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.12 / 2.2开始，此行为已更改，以改善对XML文档（包括SVG）的支持。从该版本开始，将使用 class 属性。因此， .addClass() 可以用于XML或SVG文档。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.12/2.2, this behavior is changed to improve the support for XML documents, including SVG. Starting from this version, the classattribute is used instead. So, .removeClass() can be used on XML or SVG documents.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.12 / 2.2开始，此行为已更改，以改善对XML文档（包括SVG）的支持。从该版本开始，将使用 class 属性。因此， .removeClass() 可以用于XML或SVG文档。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.12/2.2, this method supports XML documents, including SVG.
trans-unit.target: 在jQuery 1.12/2.2中,该方法支持XML文档,包括SVG。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.3, .trigger()ed events bubble up the DOM tree; an event handler can stop the bubbling by returning false from the handler or calling the .stopPropagation() method on the event object passed into the event. Although .trigger() simulates an event activation, complete with a synthesized event object, it does not perfectly replicate a naturally-occurring event.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.3开始， .trigger() ed事件在DOM树中冒泡；事件处理程序可以通过从处理程序返回 false 或在传递给事件的事件对象上调用 .stopPropagation() 方法来停止冒泡。尽管 .trigger() 模拟了一个事件激活，并完成了一个综合事件对象，但它不能完美地复制自然发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.3, the return value of a function is used instead of the function as a String.
trans-unit.target: 在jQuery 1.3中,函数的返回值被用来代替函数的字符串。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4 the results from .add() will always be returned in document order (rather than a simple concatenation).
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始,.add()的结果将总是以文档顺序返回(而不是简单的连接)。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4 the results will always be returned in document order.
trans-unit.target: 在jQuery 1.4中,结果总是按文档顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4 this method checks both properties on the object itself and properties inherited from prototypes (in that it doesn't use hasOwnProperty). The argument should always be a plain JavaScript Object as other types of object (DOM elements, primitive strings/numbers, host objects) may not give consistent results across browsers. To determine if an object is a plain JavaScript object, use $.isPlainObject()
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始，此方法同时检查对象本身的属性和从原型继承的属性（因为它不使用hasOwnProperty）。该参数应始终为普通的JavaScript Object 因为其他类型的对象（DOM元素，原始字符串/数字，宿主对象）可能无法在浏览器之间提供一致的结果。要确定对象是否为纯JavaScript对象，请使用 $.isPlainObject()

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4 we can bind multiple event handlers simultaneously by passing an object of event type/handler pairs:
trans-unit.target: 在jQuery 1.4中,我们可以通过传递一个事件类型/处理程序对的对象来同时绑定多个事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4 we can no longer attach data (and thus, events) to object, embed, or applet elements because critical errors occur when attaching data to Java applets.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始,我们不能再将数据(因此,事件)附加到对象、嵌入或applet元素上,因为在将数据附加到Java applets时,会发生关键性错误。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, .after() supports passing a function that returns the elements to insert.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .after() 支持传递一个函数，该函数返回要插入的元素。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, .css() allows us to pass a function as the property value:
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .css() 允许我们传递一个函数作为属性值：

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, calling the jQuery() method with no arguments returns an empty jQuery set (with a .length property of 0). In previous versions of jQuery, this would return a set containing the document node.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始，不带任何参数的 jQuery() 方法将返回一个空的jQuery集（ .length 属性为0）。在早期版本的jQuery中，这将返回一个包含文档节点的集合。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the $.param() method serializes deep objects recursively to accommodate modern scripting languages and frameworks such as PHP and Ruby on Rails. You can disable this functionality globally by setting jQuery.ajaxSettings.traditional = true;.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， $.param() 方法递归地序列化深层对象，以适应现代脚本语言和框架，例如PHP和Ruby on Rails。您可以通过设置 jQuery.ajaxSettings.traditional = true; 全局禁用此功能。。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the .addClass() method's argument can receive a function.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .addClass() 方法的参数可以接收一个函数。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the .html() method allows the HTML content to be set by passing in a function.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .html() 方法允许通过传入函数来设置HTML内容。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the .not() method can take a function as its argument in the same way that .filter() does. Elements for which the function returns true are excluded from the filtered set; all other elements are included.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .not() 方法可以将函数作为其参数，就像 .filter() 一样。函数返回 true 的元素从过滤后的集合中排除；所有其他元素都包括在内。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the .removeClass() method allows us to indicate the class to be removed by passing in a function.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .removeClass() 方法允许我们通过传入函数来指示要删除的类。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the .text() method allows us to set the text content by passing in a function.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .text() 方法允许我们通过传入函数来设置文本内容。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the .text() method returns the value of text and CDATA nodes as well as element nodes.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， .text() 方法返回text和CDATA节点以及元素节点的值。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the change event bubbles in Internet Explorer, behaving consistently with the event in other modern browsers.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始， change 事件在Internet Explorer中冒泡，与其他现代浏览器中的事件保持一致。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4, the same event handler can be bound to an element multiple times. This is especially useful when the event.data feature is being used, or when other unique data resides in a closure around the event handler function. For example:
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4开始，同一事件处理程序可以多次绑定到一个元素。当使用 event.data 功能或其他唯一数据驻留在事件处理函数周围的闭包中时，此功能特别有用。例如：

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4.2 duplicate event handlers can be bound to an element instead of being discarded. This is useful when the event data feature is being used, or when other unique data resides in a closure around the event handler function.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4.2开始,重复的事件处理程序可以被绑定到一个元素上,而不是被丢弃。当事件数据功能被使用时,或者当其他独特的数据驻留在事件处理函数周围的封闭中时,这很有用。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4.3 HTML 5 data- attributes will be automatically pulled in to jQuery's data object. The treatment of attributes with embedded dashes was changed in jQuery 1.6 to conform to the W3C HTML5 specification.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4.3开始，HTML 5的data-属性将自动拉入jQuery的数据对象。在jQuery 1.6中更改了对带有嵌入式破折号的属性的处理，以符合W3C HTML5规范。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4.3, an optional string naming an easing function may be used. Easing functions specify the speed at which the animation progresses at different points within the animation. The only easing implementations in the jQuery library are the default, called swing, and one that progresses at a constant pace, called linear. More easing functions are available with the use of plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4.3开始，可以使用命名缓动函数的可选字符串。缓动功能指定动画在动画内不同点处进行的速度。 jQuery库中唯一的缓动实现是默认的实现，称为 swing ，并且以恒定的速度进行实现的 linear 称为linear。通过使用插件，可以使用更多轻松功能，其中最著名的是jQuery UI suite。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.5, withDataAndEvents can be optionally enhanced with deepWithDataAndEvents to copy the events and data for all children of the cloned element.
trans-unit.target: 在jQuery 1.5的， withDataAndEvents 可任选具有增强 deepWithDataAndEvents 复制事件和数据用于克隆的元件的所有子。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.5, the Deferred object provides a way to register multiple callbacks into self-managed callback queues, invoke callback queues as appropriate, and relay the success or failure state of any synchronous or asynchronous function.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.5开始，Deferred对象提供了一种将多个回调注册到自我管理的回调队列中，酌情调用回调队列以及中继任何同步或异步函数的成功或失败状态的方法。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.5, the $.ajax() method returns the jqXHR object, which is a superset of the XMLHTTPRequest object. For more information, see the jqXHR section of the $.ajax entry
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.5开始，$ .ajax（）方法返回jqXHR对象，该对象是XMLHTTPRequest对象的超集。有关更多信息，请参见$ .ajax条目的jqXHR部分。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.5, you may use .fail() to account for errors:
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.5开始，您可以使用 .fail() 解决错误：

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.6, .css() accepts relative values similar to .animate(). Relative values are a string starting with += or -= to increment or decrement the current value. For example, if an element's padding-left was 10px, .css( "padding-left", "+=15" ) would result in a total padding-left of 25px.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.6开始， .css() 接受类似于 .animate() 的相对值。相对值是一个以 += 或 -= 开头的字符串，用于增加或减少当前值。例如，如果元素的padding-left为10px，则 .css( "padding-left", "+=15" ) 的总padding-left为25px。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.6, the .attr() method returns undefined for attributes that have not been set. To retrieve and change DOM properties such as the checked, selected, or disabled state of form elements, use the .prop() method.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.6开始， .attr() 方法为未设置的属性返回 undefined 。若要检索和更改DOM属性，例如表单元素的 checked ， selected 或 disabled 状态，请使用.prop（）方法。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.6, you can also pass an object to jQuery.Event() and its properties will be set on the newly created Event object.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.6开始，您还可以将对象传递给 jQuery.Event() ,并且其属性将在新创建的Event对象上设置。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.7 this API has been deprecated; please use deferred.state() instead.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.7开始，此API已被弃用；请改用 deferred.state() 。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.8, the .css() setter will automatically take care of prefixing the property name. For example, take .css( "user-select", "none" ) in Chrome/Safari will set it as -webkit-user-select, Firefox will use -moz-user-select, and IE10 will use -ms-user-select.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.8开始， .css() 设置器将自动处理属性名称的前缀。例如，在Chrome / Safari中使用 .css( "user-select", "none" ) 将其设置为 -webkit-user-select ，Firefox将使用 -moz-user-select ，而IE10将使用 -ms-user-select 。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.9, all the handlers for the jQuery global Ajax events, including those added with the .ajaxComplete() method, must be attached to document.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.9开始，所有用于jQuery全局Ajax事件的处理程序，包括那些添加了 .ajaxComplete() 方法的处理程序，都必须附加到 document 上。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.9, all the handlers for the jQuery global Ajax events, including those added with the .ajaxError() method, must be attached to document.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.9开始，所有用于jQuery全局Ajax事件的处理程序，包括那些添加了 .ajaxError() 方法的处理程序，都必须附加到 document 上。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.9, all the handlers for the jQuery global Ajax events, including those added with the .ajaxSend() method, must be attached to document.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.9开始，所有用于jQuery全局Ajax事件的处理程序，包括那些添加了 .ajaxSend() 方法的处理程序，都必须附加到 document 上。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.9, all the handlers for the jQuery global Ajax events, including those added with the .ajaxStart() method, must be attached to document.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.9开始，所有用于jQuery全局Ajax事件的处理程序，包括那些添加了 .ajaxStart() 方法的处理程序，都必须附加到 document 上。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.9, all the handlers for the jQuery global Ajax events, including those added with the .ajaxStop() method, must be attached to document.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.9开始，所有用于jQuery全局Ajax事件的处理程序，包括那些添加了 .ajaxStop() 方法的处理程序，都必须附加到 document 上。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.9, all the handlers for the jQuery global Ajax events, including those added with the .ajaxSuccess() method, must be attached to document.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.9开始，所有用于jQuery全局Ajax事件的处理程序，包括那些添加了 .ajaxSuccess() 方法的处理程序，都必须附加到 document 上。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0 $.isNumeric() returns true only if the argument is of type number, or if it's of type string and it can be coerced into finite numbers. In all other cases, it returns false.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始， $.isNumeric() 仅在参数的类型为 number 或 string 的类型且可以强制转换为有限数字时才返回 true 。在所有其他情况下，它返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, $.parseJSON is deprecated. To parse JSON strings use the native JSON.parse method instead.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始，不推荐使用 $.parseJSON 。要解析JSON字符串，请改用本机 JSON.parse 方法。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, .bind() has been deprecated. It was superseded by the .on() method for attaching event handlers to a document since jQuery 1.7, so its use was already discouraged. For earlier versions, the .bind() method is used for attaching an event handler directly to elements. Handlers are attached to the currently selected elements in the jQuery object, so those elements must exist at the point the call to .bind() occurs. For more flexible event binding, see the discussion of event delegation in .on().
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始， .bind() 已被弃用。自jQuery 1.7起，它已被 .on() 方法取代，该方法用于将事件处理程序附加到文档，因此已经不鼓励使用它。对于早期版本， .bind() 方法用于将事件处理程序直接附加到元素。将处理程序附加到jQuery对象中当前选定的元素上，因此这些元素必须在对 .bind() 的调用发生时存在。有关更灵活的事件绑定，请参见 .on() 中有关事件委托的讨论。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, .delegate() has been deprecated. It was superseded by the .on() method since jQuery 1.7, so its use was already discouraged. For earlier versions, however, it remains the most effective means to use event delegation. More information on event binding and delegation is in the .on() method. In general, these are the equivalent templates for the two methods:
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始，不推荐使用 .delegate() 。自jQuery 1.7起，它 .on() 方法取代，因此不鼓励使用它。但是，对于早期版本，它仍然是使用事件委托的最有效方法。有关事件绑定和委托的更多信息，请 .on() 方法。通常，这些是这两种方法的等效模板：

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, .unbind() has been deprecated. It was superseded by the .off() method since jQuery 1.7, so its use was already discouraged.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始， .unbind() 已被弃用。自jQuery 1.7起，它已被 .off() 方法取代，因此不鼓励使用它。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, .undelegate() has been deprecated. It was superseded by the .off() method since jQuery 1.7, so its use was already discouraged.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始， .undelegate() 已被弃用。自jQuery 1.7起，它已被 .off() 方法取代，因此不鼓励使用它。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, only the first syntax is recommended; the other syntaxes still work but are deprecated. This is because the selection has no bearing on the behavior of the .ready() method, which is inefficient and can lead to incorrect assumptions about the method's behavior. For example, the third syntax works with "document" which selects nothing. The fourth syntax waits for the document to be ready but implies (incorrectly) that it waits for images to become ready.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始，仅建议使用第一种语法。其他语法仍然有效，但已弃用。这是因为选择与 .ready() 方法的行为无关，这效率低下，并且可能导致对该方法的行为做出错误的假设。例如，第三个语法与 "document" 一起使用，该文档什么也不选择。第四种语法等待文档准备就绪，但是（错误地）暗示它等待图像准备就绪。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, the $.param() method no longer uses jQuery.ajaxSettings.traditional as its default setting and will default to false. For best compatibility across versions, call $.param() with an explicit value for the second argument and do not use defaults.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始， $.param() 方法不再使用 jQuery.ajaxSettings.traditional 作为其默认设置，并将默认为 false 。为了在各个版本之间实现最佳兼容性，请使用第二个参数的显式值调用 $.param() ，并且不要使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, use of this object is supported via jQuery.when or the native Promise.resolve(). Code should not make assumptions about whether this object is a jQuery.Deferred, native Promise, or some other type of promise object.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始，通过 jQuery.when 或本地 Promise.resolve() 支持使用此对象。代码不应假设此对象是 jQuery.Deferred ，本机Promise还是其他类型的Promise对象。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.3, jQuery.isFunction() has been deprecated. In most cases, its use can be replaced by typeof x === "function".
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.3开始，不推荐使用 jQuery.isFunction() 。在大多数情况下，可以使用 typeof x === "function" 代替其使用。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.4.3, an optional string naming an easing function may be used. Easing functions specify the speed at which the animation progresses at different points within the animation. The only easing implementations in the jQuery library are the default, called swing, and one that progresses at a constant pace, called linear. More easing functions are available with the use of plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4.3开始，可以使用可选的命名缓动函数的字符串。缓动功能指定动画在动画中不同点处进行的速度。jQuery库中唯一的缓动实现是默认的实现（称为 swing ）和一个以恒定速度前进的实现（称为 linear )。通过使用插件，可以使用更多轻松功能，最著名的是jQuery UI suite。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery version 1.4, you can set per-property easing functions within a single .animate() call. In the first version of .animate(), each property can take an array as its value: The first member of the array is the CSS property and the second member is an easing function. If a per-property easing function is not defined for a particular property, it uses the value of the .animate() method's optional easing argument. If the easing argument is not defined, the default swing function is used.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.4版开始，您可以在单个 .animate() 调用中设置每个属性的缓动函数。在 .animate() 的第一个版本中，每个属性都可以将数组作为其值：数组的第一个成员是CSS属性，第二个成员是缓动函数。如果未为特定属性定义按属性的缓动函数，则它将使用 .animate() 方法的可选缓动参数的值。如果未定义easing参数，则使用默认的 swing 函数。

trans-unit.source: As previously noted, a plugin is required for the easeOutBounce function.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述， easeOutBounce 函数需要一个插件。

trans-unit.source: As the return value is a jQuery object, which contains an array, it's very common to call .get() on the result to work with a basic array.
trans-unit.target: 由于返回值是一个jQuery对象，它包含一个数组，因此在结果上调用 .get() 以使用基本数组是很常见的。

trans-unit.source: As with .on(), you can pass events as an object instead of specifying an events string and handler function as separate arguments. The keys for the events object are events and/or namespaces; the values are handler functions or the special value false.
trans-unit.target: 与 .on() 一样，您可以将 events 作为对象传递，而不是将 events 字符串和 handler 函数指定为单独的参数。 events 对象的键是事件和/或名称空间。值是处理函数或特殊值 false 。

trans-unit.source: As with other pseudo-class selectors (those that begin with a ":") it is recommended to precede it with a tag name or some other selector; otherwise, the universal selector ( "*" ) is implied. In other words, the bare $( ":enabled" ) is equivalent to $( "*:enabled" ), so $( "input:enabled" ) or similar should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 与其他伪类选择器（以“：”开头的选择器）一样，建议在其前面加上标签名称或其他选择器。否则，隐含通用选择器（“ *”）。换句话说，裸 $( ":enabled" ) 等效于 $( "*:enabled" ) ，因此应改用 $( "input:enabled" ) 或类似的名称。

trans-unit.source: As with other pseudo-class selectors (those that begin with a ":"), it is recommended to precede :focus with a tag name or some other selector; otherwise, the universal selector ( "*" ) is implied. In other words, the bare $( ":focus" ) is equivalent to $( "*:focus" ). If you are looking for the currently focused element, $( document.activeElement ) will retrieve it without having to search the whole DOM tree.
trans-unit.target: 与其他伪类选择器（以“：”开头的选择器）一样，建议在 :focus 之前加上标签名称或其他选择器；否则，暗示通用选择器（“ *”）。换句话说，裸 $( ":focus" ) 等同于 $( "*:focus" ) 。如果您正在寻找当前关注的元素，则 $( document.activeElement ) 将检索它，而不必搜索整个DOM树。

trans-unit.source: As with other pseudo-class selectors (those that begin with a ":"), it is recommended to precede it with a tag name or some other selector; otherwise, the universal selector ("*") is implied. In other words, the bare $(':disabled') is equivalent to $('*:disabled'), so $('input:disabled') or similar should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 与其他伪类选择器（以“：”开头的选择器）一样，建议在其前面加上标签名称或其他选择器；否则，暗示通用选择器（“ *”）。换句话说，裸 $(':disabled') 等效于 $('*:disabled') ，因此应改用 $('input:disabled') 或类似的符号。

trans-unit.source: As with the .prop() method, the .css() method makes setting properties of elements quick and easy. This method can take either a property name and value as separate parameters, or a single object of key-value pairs.

trans-unit.source: At present, the only operations supported on plain JavaScript objects wrapped in jQuery are: .data(),.prop(),.on(), .off(), .trigger() and .triggerHandler(). The use of .data() (or any method requiring .data()) on a plain object will result in a new property on the object called jQuery{randomNumber} (eg. jQuery123456789).
trans-unit.target: 目前，支撑在普通的JavaScript的唯一操作对象包裹在jQuery的是： .data() ， .prop() ,。 .on() ， .off() ， .trigger() 和 .triggerHandler() 。在普通对象上使用 .data() （或任何需要 .data() 的方法）将在该对象上产生一个名为jQuery {randomNumber}（例如jQuery123456789）的新属性。

trans-unit.source: Attaching many delegated event handlers near the top of the document tree can degrade performance. Each time the event occurs, jQuery must compare all selectors of all attached events of that type to every element in the path from the event target up to the top of the document. For best performance, attach delegated events at a document location as close as possible to the target elements. Avoid excessive use of document or document.body for delegated events on large documents.
trans-unit.target: 在文档树的顶部附近附加许多委派的事件处理程序可能会降低性能。每次事件发生时，jQuery都必须将该类型所有附加事件的所有选择器与从事件目标到文档顶部的路径中的每个元素进行比较。为了获得最佳性能，请在尽可能靠近目标元素的文档位置附加委托事件。避免过多使用的 document 或 document.body 的用于大型文档委派的事件。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set focus to a hidden element causes an error in Internet Explorer. Take care to only use .focus() on elements that are visible. To run an element's focus event handlers without setting focus to the element, use .triggerHandler( "focus" ) instead of .focus().
trans-unit.target: 尝试将焦点设置为隐藏元素会导致Internet Explorer错误。注意仅在可见的元素上使用 .focus() 。要运行元素的焦点事件处理程序而不将焦点设置为该元素，请使用 .triggerHandler( "focus" ) 而不是 .focus() 。

trans-unit.source: Be aware, however, that jQuery's event binding subsystem assigns a unique id to each event handling function in order to track it when it is used to specify the function to be unbound. The function represented by jQuery.proxy() is seen as a single function by the event subsystem, even when it is used to bind different contexts. To avoid unbinding the wrong handler, use a unique event namespace for binding and unbinding (e.g., "click.myproxy1") rather than specifying the proxied function during unbinding.
trans-unit.target: 但是请注意，jQuery的事件绑定子系统为每个事件处理函数分配了唯一的ID，以便在用于指定要取消绑定的函数时对其进行跟踪。事件子系统将 jQuery.proxy() 表示的功能视为单个功能，即使将其用于绑定不同的上下文也是如此。为避免取消绑定错误的处理程序，请使用唯一的事件名称空间进行绑定和取消绑定（例如 "click.myproxy1" ），而不是在取消绑定期间指定代理函数。
